    • pretty

      public String pretty(String json) throws Exception
      Just return a human readable form of the JSON.
      Parameters:
      json - Must be valid.
      Returns:
      JSON with indents and new lines.
      Throws:
      Exception - It was not valid.

    • listModels

      public String listModels(Config cfg) throws Exception
      Fetch the currently available (downloaded) models.
      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration.
      Returns:
      JSON, one object, one field "models" which is a list of model objects.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • modelDetails

      public String modelDetails(Config cfg, String model) throws Exception
      Fetch detailed information on a model.
      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration.
      model - Name of an existing model.
      Returns:
      JSON describing the model.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • modelTokenList

      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration.
      model - Name of an existing model.
      Returns:

      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • getModels

      public List<JsonNode> getModels(Config cfg) throws Exception
      Fetch the currently available (downloaded) models.
      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration.
      Returns:
      List of JSON objects, should at least have a "name" field.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

      public static final void setupGUI()
      Set up the Swing GUI.

    • selectModel

      public String selectModel(Config cfg, String... titleMsg)
      Presents the user with a list of models to select from using JOptionPane.
      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration object to fetch models.
      titleMsg - Optionally, ["title"[,"message"]]
      Returns:
      The selected model (its name).

      Clear old entries from trace buffer.
      Parameters:
      dur - This long ago.

    • clearTrace

      public void clearTrace(long before)
      Clear old entries from trace buffer.
      Parameters:
      before - This point in time in milliseconds.

    • getTrace

      public LinkedList<OllamaJava.JSONIO> getTrace(boolean... andClear)
      Get a copy of the current call traces.
      Parameters:
      andClear - (optional) If true, reset the trace buffer.
      Returns:
      A copy of the call traces.

      Returns:
      Jackson object mapper.

    • askWithStream

      public Response askWithStream(String model, String prompt, OllamaJava.StreamListener listener, RenderedImage... images) throws Exception
      This calls the listener for each word.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to use.
      prompt - The question.
      listener - Callback.
      images - For vision capable models.
      Returns:
      Unlike the specification at https://github.com/jmorganca/ollama/blob/main/docs/api.md, this will also contain the full (concatenated) response in the response field of the Response object.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • chat

      public List<Response> chat(ChatRequest rq) throws Exception
      Use the chat interface against local host.
      Parameters:
      rq - The full chat request.
      Returns:
      List of responses.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • chat

      public List<Response> chat(Config cfg, ChatRequest rq) throws Exception
      Use the chat interface.
      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration.
      rq - The full chat request.
      Returns:
      List of responses.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • chat

      public List<Response> chat(Config cfg, ChatRequest rq, OllamaJava.StreamListener listener) throws Exception
      Use the chat interface.
      Parameters:
      cfg - The configuration.
      listener - If not null, will be called for each partial response.
      rq - The full chat request.
      Returns:
      List of responses.
      Throws:
      Exception - For reasons.

    • merge

      public ChatRequest merge(ChatRequest in, List<Response> answer)
      Merge a (processed) chat request with the reply.
      Parameters:
      in - The request as it was send.
      answer - The answer that was received.
      Returns:
      The chat request with the answers appended to messages.
